ygData.subject: RE: Dark Forge Bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: ack....red. makes you wonder about whoever it was who posted that 18 ac, +10 sta, black color stuff about the bp (on one of the forums, with no ss mind you,
ygData.messageBody:
ack....red.

makes you wonder about whoever it was who posted that 18 ac, +10 sta, black
color stuff about the bp (on one of the forums, with no ss mind you, was
reposted here too)...hmmmmmm.

i for one hope you are lying and/or colorblind =)

rubi is hideous.

-kg


>From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Dark Forge Bracer
>Date: Mon, 18 Oct 1999 13:38:51 -0700 (PDT)
>
>The bracer is NO DROP but not LORE. you can eventually
>get 2.
>And yes it is red.
>
>--- "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>wrote:
> > Ok so lets get this straight, you have to do this
> > quest twice to get both
> > bracers.... Hmm.. Gee like once isn't enough...
> >
> > I'm assuming that when you say it looks like rubi
> > you mean it has that god
> > awful red color (I had rubi pants for about 3
> > minutes, couldn't stand how
> > they looked though, S. Plated are much nicer
> > looking)..
> >
> > You know I keep expecting to hear good news out of
> > these quest, but as of
> > yet it hasn't happened (Good stats on bracer overall
> > though, with both it
> > would be a nice dex boost).
> >
> > Oh is it No Drop?
> >
> > Enjoy
> >
> >

> > Do you think that you'll be getting 2 bracers back
